code: import axios from"axios";const API_BASE="https://nus-iot-function.azurewebsites.net/api";export async function startCapture(){return(await axios.post(`${API_BASE}/start`)).data;}export async function stopCapture(){return(await axios.post(`${API_BASE}/stop`)).data;}export async function getEngagement(){return(await axios.get(`${API_BASE}/engagement`)).data;}export async function enrollStudent(name,fileOrBlob){const formData=new FormData();formData.append("student_name",name);formData.append("file",fileOrBlob);const res=await axios.post("https://nus-iot-function.azurewebsites.net/api/enroll-student",formData);return res.data;}
